title: Master Your Graduate School Entrance Exams
subtitle: Leverage the power of Knowledge Graph-based AI to accelerate your learning, get instant answers, and achieve your academic goals with our comprehensive study platform.
select_tool_prompt: Select from our powerful tools to enhance your study experience
ask_ai_description: Get instant answers to your questions with our advanced AI assistant. Perfect for exam preparation and concept clarification.
graph_query_description: Search knowledge graphs and discover connections between concepts using labels.
graph_exploration_description: Explore knowledge graphs and discover connections between concepts using our advanced graph visualization system.

footer.description: Empowering students with AI-driven learning solutions for graduate school entrance exams.
